entry.title: Tuesday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 3. POP 40%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. 40 percent chance of flurries this evening. Wind northeast 20 km/h becoming light near midnight. Low minus 3. Wind chill minus 8 overnight. Forecast issued 3:45 PM EST Tuesday 07 March 2023
